# [Interview #627: NY ComicCon Report - Ted Herman, Entry #8](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=627#8)

#### Ted Herman

What makes a body suitable for a transmigrated Forsaken besides channeling ability?

#### Brandon Sanderson

The Dark One looks for certain things that are not available in just any body, and we will see an illustrated example of this in
*A Memory of Light*
.
